UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Hedistin: A novel antimicrobial peptide containing bromotryptophan constitutively expressed in the NK cells-like of the marine annelid, Nereis diversicolor.
Literature.Author: Tasiemski A, Schikorski D, Le Marrec-Croq F, Pontoire-Van Camp C, Boidin-Wichlacz C, Sautière PE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=>25µM),Aeromonas hydrophila(MIC=>25µM),Alcaligenes faecalis(MIC=>25µM),Klebsiella aerogenes(MIC=>25µM),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=>25µM),Escherichia coli D31(MIC=>25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>25µM),Vibrio alginolyticus(MIC=0.8-1.6µM),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=>25µM),Haemophilus Influenzae(MIC=>25µM),Micrococcus luteus IFO 12708(MIC=0.4-0.8µM),Dermacoccus nishinomiyaensis(MIC=0.4-0.8µM),Bacillus megaterium(MIC=>25µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=3-6µM),Staphylococcus haemolyticus(MIC=3-6µM),Staphylococcus saprophyticus(MIC=3-6µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=3-6µM),Micrococcus luteus IFO 12708(MBC=1.6µM),Dermacoccus nishinomiyaensis(MBC=1.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MBC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus haemolyticus(MBC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus saprophyticus(MBC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MBC=12.5µM)
